message: Can anyone suggest an advanced Python book? Pro Python? Expert Python Programming? Others?
This wiki seems like a good start: http://wiki.python.org/moin/AdvancedBooks
pro django has a good discussion on meta classes
@williamratcliff Pro Python is essentially that infamous chapter from Pro Python extended out into an entire book :P
Expert Python Programming is also really really good.
thanks. it is helpful to see a thumbs up for both those books.
